name: Power Raiders
description:
Backstory: The world has ran out of fossil fuels to provide citizens the needs they require. A spaceman (you) has been sent off to a maze in space to collect as many nuclear barrels as possible. 

Play as a UFO and collect up nuclear barrels as points! Try and get the highest score possible, try and beat 10,000 points. Watch out for the orange glowing walls, they will harm you! And most importantly, have fun.
